description: Demo content for Restaurants industry template - perfect for restaurants, cafes, and dining establishments

company.name: Bella Vista Restaurant
company.description: Experience the finest Italian dining with fresh ingredients, traditional recipes, and warm hospitality in the heart of downtown.

hero.title: Welcome to Bella Vista
hero.subtitle: Experience authentic Italian cuisine in an elegant atmosphere. Fresh ingredients, traditional recipes, and warm hospitality await you.
hero.alt: Elegant restaurant interior with Italian decor

menu.title: Featured Dishes
menu.subtitle: Savor our chef's signature creations made with the finest ingredients

featured_dishes.name: Osso Buco alla Milanese
featured_dishes.description: Slow-braised veal shanks with vegetables, white wine, and aromatic herbs, served with saffron risotto.

featured_dishes.name: Risotto ai Funghi Porcini
featured_dishes.description: Creamy Arborio rice with wild porcini mushrooms, truffle oil, and aged Parmigiano-Reggiano.

featured_dishes.name: Branzino al Sale
featured_dishes.description: Mediterranean sea bass baked in sea salt crust with lemon, herbs, and extra virgin olive oil.

featured_dishes.name: Tiramisu Classico
featured_dishes.description: Traditional Italian dessert with mascarpone, ladyfingers, espresso, and cocoa powder.

about.title: Our Story
about.description: Bella Vista has been serving authentic Italian cuisine for over 25 years. Our family recipes, passed down through generations, combined with the finest ingredients and warm hospitality, create an unforgettable dining experience.
about.alt: Chef Mario preparing traditional Italian dishes

features.title: Authentic Recipes
features.description: Traditional Italian recipes passed down through generations

features.title: Fresh Ingredients
features.description: Locally sourced, seasonal ingredients for maximum flavor

features.title: Wine Selection
features.description: Curated selection of Italian wines from renowned vineyards

features.title: Private Dining
features.description: Elegant private dining rooms for special occasions

atmosphere.title: Experience Bella Vista
atmosphere.subtitle: Immerse yourself in the warm ambiance of authentic Italian dining

atmosphere_images.alt: Main dining room with elegant table settings
atmosphere_images.title: Main Dining Room

atmosphere_images.alt: Cozy bar area with wine selection
atmosphere_images.title: Wine Bar

atmosphere_images.alt: Private dining room for special events
atmosphere_images.title: Private Events

reservations.title: Make a Reservation
reservations.subtitle: Book your table for an unforgettable dining experience

reviews_data.name: Sarah Mitchell
reviews_data.quote: Absolutely incredible dining experience! The osso buco was perfection, and the service was impeccable. Bella Vista is now our go-to restaurant for special occasions.

reviews_data.name: James Rodriguez
reviews_data.quote: The atmosphere is romantic and the food is outstanding. The wine selection is excellent and the staff knows their pairings. Highly recommend!

reviews_data.name: Maria Gonzalez
reviews_data.quote: Authentic Italian flavors that transport you to Italy. The pasta is made fresh daily and the desserts are heavenly. A true gem in the city!

contact.title: Contact Bella Vista
contact.description: Get in touch with us for reservations, catering, or any questions about our restaurant.

footer.description: Authentic Italian cuisine and warm hospitality in the heart of downtown since 1995.

seo.meta_description: Experience authentic Italian dining at Bella Vista Restaurant. Traditional recipes, fresh ingredients, and exceptional service in an elegant downtown setting.
seo.keywords: Italian restaurant, fine dining, authentic Italian food, reservations, downtown dining, Italian cuisine
